tokens.name: text/default
tokens.description: Use for headings, section headers, and body text where not specified otherwise.

tokens.name: text/subtle
tokens.description: Use for main body text or where text with less emphasis is needed. Use also for secondary text, such as navigation, subtle button links, input field labels.

tokens.name: text/subtlest
tokens.description: Use for tertiary text, such as meta-data, breadcrumbs, input field placeholder and helper text.

tokens.name: text/inverse
tokens.description: Use for text on bold backgrounds.

tokens.name: text/brand
tokens.description: Use for text that reinforces our brand.

tokens.name: text/selected
tokens.description: Use for text in selected or opened states, such as tabs and dropdown buttons.

tokens.name: text/danger
tokens.description: Use for critical text, such as input field error messaging.

tokens.name: text/danger-bolder
tokens.description: Use for text on top of danger semantic labels to ensure accessibility and desired visual appearance.

tokens.name: text/warning
tokens.description: Use for text to emphasize caution.

tokens.name: text/warning-inverse
tokens.description: Use for text when on bold warning backgrounds.

tokens.name: text/warning-bolder
tokens.description: Use for text when on bold warning backgrounds.

tokens.name: text/success
tokens.description: Use for text to communicate a favorable outcome, such as input field success messaging.

tokens.name: text/success-bolder
tokens.description: Use for text on top of success semantic labels to ensure accessibility and desired visual appearance.

tokens.name: text/information
tokens.description: Use for informative text or to communicate something is in progress.

tokens.name: text/information-bolder
tokens.description: Use for text on top of information semantic labels to ensure accessibility and desired visual appearance.

tokens.name: text/discovery
tokens.description: Use for text to emphasize change or something new, such as in new lozenges.

tokens.name: text/discovery-bolder
tokens.description: Use for text on top of discovery semantic labels to ensure accessibility and desired visual appearance.

tokens.name: link/default
tokens.description: Use for links in a default or hovered state. Add an underline for hovered states.

tokens.name: link/pressed
tokens.description: Use for links in a default or hovered state. Add an underline for hovered states.

tokens.name: icon/subtle
tokens.description: Use for icons paired with color.text.subtle

tokens.name: icon/subtlest
tokens.description: Use for icons paired with color.text.subtlest

tokens.name: icon/inverse
tokens.description: Use for icons on bold backgrounds.

tokens.name: icon/brand
tokens.description: Use for icons that reinforce our brand.

tokens.name: icon/selected
tokens.description: Use for icons in selected or opened states, such as those used in dropdown buttons.

tokens.name: icon/danger
tokens.description: Use for icons communicating critical information, such as those used in error handing.

tokens.name: icon/warning
tokens.description: Use for icons communicating caution, such as those used in warning section messages.

tokens.name: icon/warning-inverse
tokens.description: Use for icons when on bold warning backgrounds.

tokens.name: icon/success
tokens.description: Use for icons communicating a favorable outcome, such as those used in success section messaged.

tokens.name: icon/discovery
tokens.description: Use for icons communicating change or something new, such as discovery section messages.

tokens.name: icon/information
tokens.description: Use for icons communicating information or something in-progress, such as information section messages.

tokens.name: text/accent/red
tokens.description: Use for red text on subtlest and subtler red accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: text/accent/red/bolder
tokens.description: Use for red text on subtle red accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: icon/accent/red
tokens.description: Use for red icons on non-bold backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color, such as file type icons.

tokens.name: text/accent/orange
tokens.description: Use for orange text on subtlest and subtler orange accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: text/accent/orange/bolder
tokens.description: Use for orange text on subtle orange accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: icon/accent/orange
tokens.description: Use for orange icons on non-bold backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color, such as file type icons.

tokens.name: text/accent/yellow
tokens.description: Use for yellow text on subtlest and subtler yellow accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: text/accent/yellow/bolder
tokens.description: Use for yellow text on subtle yellow accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: icon/accent/yellow
tokens.description: Use for yellow icons on non-bold backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color, such as file type icons.

tokens.name: text/accent/green
tokens.description: Use for green text on subtlest and subtler green accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: text/accent/green/bolder
tokens.description: Use for green text on subtle green accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: icon/accent/green
tokens.description: Use for green icons on non-bold backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color, such as file type icons.

tokens.name: text/accent/cyan
tokens.description: Use for cyan text on subtlest and subtler green accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: text/accent/cyan/bolder
tokens.description: Use for cyan text on subtle red accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: icon/accent/cyan
tokens.description: Use for cyan icons on non-bold backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color, such as file type icons.

tokens.name: text/accent/blue
tokens.description: Use for blue text on subtlest and subtler blue accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: text/accent/blue/bolder
tokens.description: Use for blue text on subtle blue accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: icon/accent/blue
tokens.description: Use for blue icons on non-bold backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color, such as file type icons.

tokens.name: text/accent/purple
tokens.description: Use for purple text on subtlest and subtler purple accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: text/accent/purple/bolder
tokens.description: Use for purple text on subtle purple accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: icon/accent/purple
tokens.description: Use for purple icons on non-bold backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color, such as file type icons.

tokens.name: text/accent/magenta
tokens.description: Use for magenta text on subtlest and subtler magenta accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: text/accent/magenta/bolder
tokens.description: Use for magenta text on subtle magenta accent backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color.

tokens.name: icon/accent/magenta
tokens.description: Use for magenta icons on non-bold backgrounds when there is no meaning tied to the color, such as file type icons.

tokens.name: font/family/body
tokens.description: Primary app font

tokens.name: font/family/code
tokens.description: Use for displaying code (inline and blocks)

tokens.name: font/family/technical
tokens.description: Use for numbers in tables and special labels

tokens.name: font/size/1000
tokens.description: For H1 headings

tokens.name: font/size/900
tokens.description: For H2 headings

tokens.name: font/size/800
tokens.description: For H3 headings

tokens.name: font/size/700
tokens.description: For H4 headings

tokens.name: font/size/600
tokens.description: For H5 headings and sub-titles beneath larger headings

tokens.name: font/size/500
tokens.description: Default text size. Use for main body text.

tokens.name: font/size/400
tokens.description: Smaller text size. Use for input titles, secondary text, small callouts, in toasts, etc.

tokens.name: font/size/300
tokens.description: For use in tags and for both inline code and code blocks

tokens.name: font/size/200
tokens.description: Use for tertiary text, like disclaimers. Use sparingly, as its accessibility is limited.

tokens.name: font/height/1000
tokens.description: H1 line-height

tokens.name: font/height/900
tokens.description: H2 line-height

tokens.name: font/height/800
tokens.description: H3 line-height

tokens.name: font/height/700
tokens.description: H4 line-height

tokens.name: font/height/600
tokens.description: Use to set line-height for H5 headings and default body text (at 16px font-size)

tokens.name: font/height/500
tokens.description: Use to set line-height for secondary text (14px)

tokens.name: font/height/400
tokens.description: Use only for inline code or code blocks (not for technical text)

tokens.name: font/height/300
tokens.description: Use for 12px font-size

tokens.name: font/height/200
tokens.description: Use to set line-height in tags

tokens.name: font/spacing/normal
tokens.description: Use for all text styles except H1, H2, H3, H4 headings

tokens.name: font/spacing/tight
tokens.description: Use for H1, H2, H3, H4 headings

tokens.name: font/weight/regular
tokens.description: Use for all primary body text

tokens.name: font/weight/medium
tokens.description: Use for text that needs a bit more emphasis (like primary titles in table rows), labels next to checkboxes and switches, etc.

tokens.name: font/weight/semibold
tokens.description: Use for inline section headers, helping to group related content

tokens.name: spacing/25
tokens.description: Use for small and compact pieces of UI.

tokens.name: spacing/50
tokens.description: Use for small and compact pieces of UI.

tokens.name: spacing/75
tokens.description: Use for small and compact pieces of UI.

tokens.name: spacing/100
tokens.description: Use for small and compact pieces of UI.

tokens.name: spacing/150
tokens.description: Use for larger and less dense pieces of UI

tokens.name: spacing/200
tokens.description: Use for larger and less dense pieces of UI

tokens.name: spacing/250
tokens.description: Use for larger and less dense pieces of UI

tokens.name: spacing/300
tokens.description: Use for larger and less dense pieces of UI

tokens.name: spacing/400
tokens.description: Use for the largest pieces of the UI and for layout elements.

tokens.name: spacing/600
tokens.description: Use for the largest pieces of the UI and for layout elements.

tokens.name: spacing/800
tokens.description: Use for the largest pieces of the UI and for layout elements.

tokens.name: spacing/1000
tokens.description: Use for the largest pieces of the UI and for layout elements.

tokens.name: radius/square
tokens.description: No radius applied. Use sparingly.

tokens.name: radius/25
tokens.description: Use for small detail elements: badges, checkboxes, avatar labels, keyboard shortcuts.

tokens.name: radius/50
tokens.description: Use for supporting elements: labels, lozenges, timestamps, tags, dates, tooltip containers, imagery inside a table, compact buttons.

tokens.name: radius/75
tokens.description: Use for interactive elements: buttons, inputs, text areas, selects, navigation items, smart links.

tokens.name: radius/100
tokens.description: Use for containment elements: buttons, small cards cards, in-page containers, floating UI, dropdown menus.

tokens.name: radius/150
tokens.description: Use for larger page elements: small to medium cards, photos

tokens.name: radius/200
tokens.description: Use for larger page elements: large cards

tokens.name: radius/250
tokens.description: Use for larger page elements: large cards

tokens.name: radius/300
tokens.description: Use for largest UI elements, like modals

tokens.name: radius/400
tokens.description: Use for largest UI elements, like modals

tokens.name: radius/round
tokens.description: Use for circular elements

tokens.name: stroke/default
tokens.description: Default stroke width for dividers, inputs, small cards

tokens.name: stroke/bold
tokens.description: Bolder width for components or elements requiring more emphasis, like large cards

tokens.name: stroke/focused
tokens.description: Use for focus states on interactive elements like inputs

tokens.name: stroke/selected
tokens.description: Use to indicate a selected elements, like inputs, cards
